title: Ryan's IELTS Writing Course

This video course has been organised into 3 steps. Step 1 is a group of video tutorials that explain the basics of IELTS Writing and several structures that can be applied to Academic and General Task 1 and 2 responses.

Step 2 is a series of demonstration videos that illustrate how to use what has been learned in Step 1.

Step 3 groups videos that focus on sharpening the candidateÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s performance in the Task Achievement, Coherence and Cohesion, Lexical Resources, and Grammatical Range and Accuracy areas that make up the overall writing band.

To download the latest version of this video course, visit http://www.ieltsielts.com.

To interact with candidates and instructors on the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s largest IELTS forum, visit http://www.ieltsnetwork.com.
